name: jest-puppeteer-to-have
description: DOM selection rule-them-all, jest-puppeteer custom matcher and also for manipulation

scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run prettier && npm run build && npm run test && npm run docs
scripts.docs: npx typedoc src/toHave/types.ts src/toEdit/types.ts --out docs/api &&  npx typedoc src/toHave/types.ts src/toEdit/types.ts --theme markdown --out docs/api-md
scripts.prettier: npx prettier  --write --arrow-parens avoid --parser typescript --use-tabs false --no-semi true --single-quote true --tab-width 2 --trailing-comma all --end-of-line lf --prose-wrap preserve --print-width 120 --no-bracket-spacing  "src/**/*.ts"

author: Sebastian Gurin
